channel.title: Help please
channel.description: Ok I have been trying to make npc dialogues on pimpscape but it just won't work and i've coded it on a different server just to make sure I was coding it right and it worked for that server but not for mine any suggestions?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 09:12:35 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

				if (npcs[i].npcType == "npcID") { // "npc name" - "what he is"						if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "what he says";
					}
				}

thats the code… it goes in npcHandler.java.

Read full topic
